short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play any video from YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo, Twitch or Rutube in a standalone, full resizable window!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just click the extension button to open a YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo, Twitch or Rutube video in a resizable window.
